title: Friar's Heel Beekeeper

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use 1 bee to learn what date a player's role was posted on.
- Use 2 bees to rampage roleblock a player through immunities.
- Use 3 bees to deal a Basic attack to a player, a Powerful attack to their first target or them if they don't have one, and an Unstoppable attack to that player's first target or them if they don't have one.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: You will earn 1 bee every night. You can use 2 abilities per night.

desc:
Post 2715
*We will, we will bzzzz you!*
